name: Café Wolfenstein
description:
Dateline: Berlin, 1944. You have been entrusted with Café Wolfenstein, the most popular diner among the Third Reich. Your mission: sabotage! Feed the Nazi scum the most greasy, unhealthy meals you can deep-fry and watch their war machine grind to a halt as they become unable to do any activity more strenuous than picking up a menu.

Café Wolfenstein is a simple, comedic clicker that takes little skill or strategy to complete, but does provide the humorous situation of feeding Nazis terrible food and watching them whine about how fat they're getting.

This is an entry in the Games vs Nazis game jam (Feb 6 to Feb 13, 2017).
